title: Gasoline wholesalers required to sell reserves amid fuel shortage
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

The Ministry of Industry and Trade has requested state-run gasoline and oil wholesalers to sell their commercial reserves to mitigate fuel shortages in some localities. Minister of Industry and Trade Nguyen Hong Dien on Wednesday asked PVN, Petrolimex, Mipec, Petimex and Thanh Le General Import-Export Trading Corporation to sell their reserves. Usually, wholesalers are supposed […]
